Portallar açıp bulmacalar çözüp hikayeyi devam ettirdiğimiz bu oyunu oynamadan geçmeyin. Gerçekten de son derece harika bir oyun. Üstelik sistem gereksinimleri de Source Engine ile yapılmasından dolayı oldukça düşük. Çoğu bilgisayarda yüksek FPS ile oynayabileceğiniz bu oyunu almanızı şiddetle öneriyorum. Ayrıca indirime girdiğinde oldukça düşük bir fiyata temin edebilirsiniz. Oyunun kısa olmasına aldanmayın. Atölye içeriği indirebilir ve oynamaya, bulmaca çözmeye devam edebilirsiniz. Bu oyunun bir diğer artısı da devam oyununun olması. İyi oyunlar.

Watched gameplay years ago, and bought portal 2 which was amazing, and this one is still enjoyable and aged really well !

If you are interested in Portal, try Portal 2 first.

Don't get me wrong, Portal is very solid game. However, I see it as more as a prequel to Portal 2, rather than how Portal 2 is actually a sequel to it. Mainly because you don't need to play Portal to understand anything about Portal 2. Portal is an amazing game, but pales in comparison to Portal 2. This is because once Portal got the concept across, Portal 2 was there to flesh out, tweak, or completely overhaul what Portal first established. I like Portal, but I don't love it. It has a couple problems that are completely gone in Portal 2. For instance: waiting. There is a lot of waiting in Portal, waiting for platforms to circle back around, waiting for an energy pellet to cross the room, waiting for GLaDOS to stop talking before a door opens. All alleviated with the new design of Portal 2.

 I'd say if you liked Portal 2, then buy this one to see the origin story of a masterpiece.

PROS:

1. You can create freaking portals to traverse in space and solve puzzles
2. Wonderful level design and atmosphere. Was really absorbed in Aperture Labs.
3. "[i]Are you still there?[/i]" The creepiest thing anyone can ask you in that creepy voice. Wonderfully done. Very sick and genius,
4. Oh my God the taunts and the sarcasm. Pure gold.
5. Did I mention you can freaking create portals and tear a hole in space-time to solve puzzles?

CONS:
1. Very short.

Thankfully we have Portal 2.
Very innovative game play, would definitely recommend to anyone.
Should be a free2play game
One of the best games of all time. A classic that should be played by every gamer. The only thing that would make it better is if it could be played in VR.

Хочу сказать, что Valve в своё время очень хорошо поработали и выпустили на свет Portal. Игра интересна своими головоломками, а так же классным сюжетом. Мне очень понравилась механика порталов и сама портальная пушка. Сперва покажется что игра очень скучная, так как в ней нету противников или т.п. Но на самом деле это не так. В этой игре понадобиться от вас только быстрая реакция и умение правильно и вовремя ставить порталы. Когда начнете играть она вас затянет, и вы захотите её пройти до конца!

Моя оценка Portal'у 10/10. Я всем советую поиграть в этот шедевр!
